meanings.definition: The quality or state of being admissible.
meanings.sent1: The admissibility of the evidence in court was questioned by the defense attorney.
meanings.sent2: The admissibility of the document was crucial for the case.
meanings.sent3: The admissibility of the cat into the dog show caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her admissibility into the exclusive club was like winning a golden ticket.
meanings.sent5: The admissibility of the new student into the school was met with cheers and applause.

meanings.definition: The ability or permission to enter or be accepted.
meanings.sent1: Without proper identification, the admissibility into the concert was denied.
meanings.sent2: The admissibility of the visa application was a relief for the traveler.
meanings.sent3: The admissibility of the penguin into the tropical party raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: His admissibility into the secret society felt like stepping into a hidden world.
meanings.sent5: The admissibility of the stray cat into the cozy home warmed everyone's hearts.
